Comment: Abilities: A0VC (Viral Plague), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Corrupt the blood of a target unit with a nasty plague. The afflicted unit cannot cast spells and will take <A04A,DataA3> damage per second. Upon its death, 4 Elite Abominations will spawn from its corpse. Viral Plague cannot be dispelled or cancelled.|nLasts 8 seconds on heroes and indefinitely on units.
